title: Attempting to Reconnect
body:
I started out my day this morning with a LoL match. It was all going fine until I started to experience some lag, except it was a little unusual.  I would be unable to move, type, buy items etc. Yet I could still see all the other players moving around. The infamous "Attempting to Reconnect" sign would pop up for 5-15 seconds and then it would all be fine again. 

After this happened for a while it would eventually not be able to reconnect again and after exiting the client I would not be able to open it again, for 30-60 minutes. This resulted in me losing two games (ranked), getting demoted and now I have been put in a lower priority queue. This is the second time I have been put into a lower priority queue due to lag. Trust me, I am not one to ragequit, I'm one of those 'Never Surrender' people that everyone hates. 

Anyways, I was just wondering if anyone else had experienced this and perhaps anyone knows what was going on. Both games I would of easily won, so it's extremely frustrating.

replies.body:
That could mean you're having upload issues.

Have you tried [changing DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4)?

I feel so copy-paste mentioning that to everyone, but that's what seems to solve almost every issue.

If that doesn't work, could you please tell me your OS and ISP?

Best of luck.
